at.geyerritter.dezsys07.rest

Interface DataRecordService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoDBDataRecordService

    public interface DataRecordService
    The service uses a repository to create/read/update/delete data records.
    Version:
    20151217.1
    Author:
    Stefan Geyer, Mathias Ritter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataRecord create(DataRecord record)
      Persist a DataRecord in the database
      DataRecord delete(String id)
      Deletes an existing record from the database.
      DataRecord findById(String id)
      Finds a specific DataRecord
      List<DataRecord> findTop100() 
      List<DataRecord> findTop100ByNameContainingIgnoreCase(String name)
      Finds every DataRecord that contains the given name up to a maximum of 100
      DataRecord update(DataRecord record)
      Updates a existing DataRecord

    • Method Detail

      • create

        DataRecord create(DataRecord record)
        Persist a DataRecord in the database
        Parameters:
        record - The record that will be created and persisted
        Returns:
        The persisted DataRecord

      • delete

        DataRecord delete(String id)
        Deletes an existing record from the database. The deleted record will be returned
        Parameters:
        id - The record that will be deleted
        Returns:
        The deleted record

      • findById

        DataRecord findById(String id)
             throws org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException
        Finds a specific DataRecord
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the DataRecord
        Returns:
        The DataRecord if found
        Throws:
        org.springframework.dao.EmptyResultDataAccessException - if the data record can not be found

      • findTop100ByNameContainingIgnoreCase

        List<DataRecord> findTop100ByNameContainingIgnoreCase(String name)
        Finds every DataRecord that contains the given name up to a maximum of 100
        Parameters:
        name - The name that will be searched
        Returns:
        A list of all DataRecords containing the given name

      • update

        DataRecord update(DataRecord record)
        Updates a existing DataRecord
        Parameters:
        record - The DataRecord that will be updated
        Returns:
        The DTO of the updated DataRecord

      • findTop100

        List<DataRecord> findTop100()
